document_data.name: Bretchimus
document_data.mainbody: '''Bretchimus''' was a guard at Castle [[Felmorel]] in the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was rather old for a guard.
document_data.Possessions: Bretchimus wielded a [[pike]] that was in sorry shape.
document_data.Activities: He sometimes watched the front gate alone.
document_data.Relationships: He served under Lord [[Esbre Felmorel]]. His brother was [[Habaertus Ilynker]].
document_data.History: On a spring night of the {{yearlinkName|761}}, [[Elminster Aumar|Wanlorn]] was present at a feast at Castle Felmorel. When he snuck out, the one guard that watched the gate was Bretchimus. He completely missed not only Wanlorn, but [[Thessamel Arunder]], and luckily for him, even [[Saeraede Lyonora|the Slayer]].
